# preferredTransition

**Instance Property**

An object that defines the transition animation when switching to the view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var preferredTransition: UIViewController.Transition? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to define which transition the system uses when you present a view controller. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/enhancing-your-app-with-fluid-transitions].

## Working with transitions

- **UIViewController.Transition**: An object that defines the transition animation when switching to a new view controller.
